attributes.action: To submit our application to join the European Free Trade Association.
attributes.additional_details:
The press do this by stating that individual trading agreements are required and can take up to 5-10 years.

However, clearly this isn't the case. Apart from North America and parts of Africa, agreements are already in place.

Lets calm down, join Noway, Iceland, Switzerland and Liechtenstein (EFTA of which we were founder members of in 1960) and enjoy unhindered FREE TRADE.

Thankyou.
attributes.background: Since the UK has voted out of the EU through a democratic process, the press has been spreading fear to sell their newspapers, by accentuating the economic consequences. They do this by stating that individual trading agreements are required and can take up to 5-10 years.
